modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the corrected HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description and the example provided:

*Extracted text from website*: "Demetri Andriani HOME STORY TOUR"
- Incorrect HTML: <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
- Thought: I need to correct the above HTML by adding the "lang" attribute and assigning the appropriate language using the "Extracted text from website" for language context. The text appears to be in English, so I will set the lang attribute to "en".
- Corrected HTML: <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en">
